checklist_mapa.descricao: A practical checklist guide to help your church map the digital mission field and take the first concrete steps.
checklist_mapa.descricao_completa: This checklist was developed to help pastors and leaders identify evangelism opportunities in the digital world. It includes practical questions about the church’s reality, community profile, current digital presence, and concrete next steps. By the end, you will have a clear map of your church’s digital mission field.

ia_reino.titulo: AI at the Service of the Kingdom
ia_reino.descricao: How artificial intelligence can be an ally in evangelism and discipleship. Practical concepts for leaders and churches.
ia_reino.descricao_completa: Artificial intelligence is transforming the world. This guide explores how leaders and churches can use AI tools ethically and strategically to improve communication, create content, and reach more people with the Gospel.

guia_daod.descricao: A complete step-by-step guide to implement Digital to Discipleship in your church.
guia_daod.descricao_completa: Digital to Discipleship (DaoD) is a complete methodology to transform your church’s digital environment into a missionary field. This guide includes church preparation, space structuring, volunteer recruitment, activity schedule, gamer-language devotionals, and follow-up for new converts.

checklist_gank.descricao: Everything you need to prepare for a successful Evangelistic Gank.
checklist_gank.descricao_completa: The Evangelistic Gank is a coordinated action where the church joins streamers' lives together to share the Gospel with love. This checklist includes spiritual preparation, participant organization, target selection, prepared messages, post-gank follow-up, and more.

gamificacao.descricao: How to use game elements to communicate Christ’s message.
gamificacao.descricao_completa: Gamification is the application of game elements in non-game contexts. This ebook explores how principles like reward, progression, challenge, and community can be used to make discipleship more engaging and effective for the new generation.

cta.title: Want to go beyond the materials?
cta.text: These resources are a starting point. If you want to bring digital evangelism into your church with practical training and real action, discover our projects.
